name: Hypernova (itch) (Out There Games)
description:
WARNING: THE WEB BUILD HAS MUCH LOWER FPS AND JITTERS A BUNCH. TO PLAY WITHOUT THESE ISSUES, PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION!!

A fast and fluid first person platformer, built around speedrunning. Run, jump and dash your way through various eight different levels and challenge your friends to beat your best times!

art/modeling by Blizz: https://www.youtube.com/@BlizzCraftOfficial

music by DaNuthee: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXhCbVhTsyruLjI7xr7lbLg

game by... me
